Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3173738F] DMCA NOTICE: Copyrighted Content on
FREE-SAT-TV.ORG

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

From: "Scott Kidder" <scott@gawker.com>

        abuse@hostgator.com, admins@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com 
Subject: DMCA NOTICE: Copyrighted Content on FREE-SAT-TV.ORG

Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com
designates 64.233.162.239 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.162.239;
envelope-from=skidder@gmail.com; helo=nz-out-0506.google.com; 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 21 Feb 2007 22:01:33.0393 (UTC)
FILETIME=[D94CD410:01C75603] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Re: DMCA Copyright Infringement 
 
Dear Administrator, 
 
I represent Gawker Media, LLC who has authorized me to act on its 
behalf for copyright infringement notification. 
 
Infringement of dozens of Gawker Media copyrighed articles (the 
"articles") have been detected on the Web site free-sat-tv.org. They 
are exact copies of the articles appearing at the web site 
http://www.gawker.com. 
 
To the best of my knowledge, the entire website is merely our stolen 
content from www.gawker.com wrapped in their ads. Examples include: 
 
http://www.free-sat-tv.org/2007/02/21/blogorrhea-nyc-ash-wednesday-mayhe
m/ 
http://gawker.com/news/blogorrhea/blogorrhea-nyc-ash-wednesday-mayhem-23
8485.php 
 
http://www.free-sat-tv.org/2007/02/21/laguna-beach-producers-soliciting-
new-reality-intern-victims/ 
http://gawker.com/news/internships/laguna-beach-producers-soliciting-new
-reality-internvictims-238261.php 
 
This letter is an official notification under the provisions of 
Section 512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect 
removal of the detected infringement. I hereby request that you 
IMMEDIATELY issue a cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036, for the 
specified posting and prevent the infringer, who is identified by its 
Web address, from posting the infringing articles to your servers in 
the future. Please be advised that by law, as a service provider, you 
must "expeditiously remove or disable access to" the infringing 
articles upon receiving this notice. Noncompliance may result in a 
loss of the possibility of immunity under the DMCA. 
 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials 
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not 
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. The 
information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge. 
I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on 
behalf of Gawker Media, LLC for matters pertaining to notification of 
infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material. 
 
You are hereby put on notice that the content must be removed from 
http://www.free-sat-tv.org/ immediately. Please confirm by 
email or telephone that you have complied with your obligations under 
the Act by removing the content from http://www.free-sat-tv.org/ 
 
Please respond by email to me at scott@gawker.com a prompt response 
indicating the actions you have taken to resolve this matter. 
 
Very truly yours, 
 
Scott Kidder 
 
--  
Scott Kidder | Gawker Media 
p. 212.655.9524 x405 | f. 443.269.0582
